name: trello_bulk_move_cards
description: Move multiple Trello cards to a target list in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling trello_move_card multiple times. Pass card IDs as a comma-separated string.

parameters.name: card_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated Trello card IDs to move

parameters.name: target_list_id
parameters.description: Target list ID to move all cards to

detailSteps.code: const cardId = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get('_id') || ''; const resp = await fetch('/1/cards/' + cardId + '?idList={{target_list_id}}', { method: 'PUT', credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) return { status: 'error', card_id: cardId, error: resp.status }; const card = await resp.json(); return { status: 'moved', card_id: card.id, card_name: card.name }
detailSteps.name: move_result
detailSteps.label: Move card
